notesStmt.note: Imperfect at the end. Lacuna after folio 137.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Services for the feast of Sukot, according to the Provencal (Avignon) rite.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Sefardi (Provencal) square and semi-cursive script of the 17th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine: 'Services for Feast of Tabernacles. Rite of Avignon. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 5466.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: S. Raffalovich: purchased from him by the British Museum on 13 December 1898: inscribed, folio [147v].
